Nightstrike::

Nightstrike opened his comm link to Megatron "Mylord, the work it's 
done... Firestrike, Blindfear and I are waitting our next commands"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The chant cut straight into Motormaster fuel pump. All his confusion
> washed away, by his passion, in the cause he believed so strongly 
in. He
> may have been created by Decepticons, but he served because he 
believed
> in it. He transformed, stood up, and held out his hand, and 
followed the
> mantra. How he would make Slaughter pay, for making him forget that.
> "You heard Megatron boys, Transform to form MENASOR." he said
> transforming to his truck mode again. Speedbreaker emerged from the
> woods, and joined the three transformed Stunticons.
